origin_dialogue: Use /MovementControls/ and then press /BlackButton/,  /WhiteButton/, or /RightFlipper/ to map the selected power to that button.
To pull out an item from your backpack, point to it with /MovementControls/ and then press /AButton/. To return it to your backpack later, press /BButton/.
Please reconnect the controller to controller port
Drag /FullMouse/ or use Right /Joystick/ TO NAVIGATE.

You don't have enough free space to save this profile.
Press /Abutton/ to continue without saving or /Bbutton/ to free more space.

You don't have enough free space to save games.
Press /Abutton/ to continue without saving or /Bbutton/ to free more space.
Saving AUTOSAVE: POINT OF NO RETURN.
Control speed with /MovementControls/ or use it to change rails when jumping.
Use /MovementControls/ or /FullMouse/ to navigate the Journal.
You have too many items to fit on one page! Use /DPadRight/ to see the rest of your items.
Raz has stowed the item in his backpack. To see what's in Raz's backpack, and what merit badges he has, press the /DPadLeft/ button.
Type your nickname. Only letters and numbers allowed.
This save game appears to be damaged and cannot be used. Press /AButton/ to continue.
This profile appears to be damaged and cannot be used. Press /AButton/ to continue.
While you were away, your game was automatically paused.
Are you sure you want to quit your game and go back to the title screen? If you haven't saved, your progress will be lost!
Are you sure you want to stop playing Psychonauts?

This DOWSING ROD can be used to find deeper, more valuable PSITANIUM ARROWHEADS. Equip the DOWSING ROD and watch and listen to its changing color and sound. This is how it lets you know that you are getting closer to a DEEP ARROWHEAD.
Changes to hardware acceleration will not take effect until you restart the game.
